attributes.action: £53 per week free spending money plus free housing is more than enough money to give someone who is capable of work.
attributes.additional_details:
£53 per week free spending money plus free housing is more than enough money to give someone who is capable of work.

We do not want anymore than this sum to be taken from the taxes which are given in good faith in order to help those who are sadly unable to work.

Please note: a healthy female who has elected to have a child is not an example of someone who is ‘sadly unable to work’.
